title: LEAGUE DISPLAYS BUG
body: so I've recently downloaded the league displays app and applied a single wallpaper. It often happens that the wallpaper only displays on 1/5 (more or less) of the screen, while the rest becomes a blue screen with white dots. to solve it I have to open any app and drag it to the left or right side of my screen and then the wallpaper comes back to normal, only to bug out again soon after. Any ideas?

replies.body:
It sounds like some files might've been corrupted the first time it was installed. It might be best to go with a clean reinstall to make sure it starts off on a fresh slate.

If you're still seeing these issues after reinstalling, we have some steps that could help on this [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207525756).

Then if THAT doesn't help, then it could be a bug that we just haven't seen before. Be sure to report it directly within League Displays using the little bug icon on the bottom right! :)
